hadiths.text: It was narrated that the Mother of the Belivers Aishah said:"I wished that I had asked the Messenger of Allah for permission as Sawdha did, so that I could pray Fajir in Mina before the people came. Sawdah was heavyset woman, so she asked the Messenger of Allah for permission, and he gave her permission to pray Fajir in Mina and stone the before the people came

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ لِلضَّعَفَةِ أَنْ يُصَلُّوا يَوْمَ النَّحْرِ الصُّبْحَ بِمِنًى
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing The Weak To Pray Subh On The Day Of Sacrifice In Mina
